bill_title: provide certain restrictions for local governments that have opted out of the limitation on tax levy increases.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to provide certain restrictions for local governments that have opted out of the limitation on tax levy increases. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 10-12 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If a governing body of a school district has opted out of the limitation on tax levy increases pursuant to § 10-12-43 and the total general fund balance of the school district exceeds thirty percent as of June thirtieth in two consecutive years, the authority of the school district to have an excess tax levy is revoked. The school district is then subject to the limitations of the general fund tax levies provided in § 10-12-42. Section 2. That chapter 10-13 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: If a governing body of a taxing district has opted out of the limitation on tax levy increases pursuant to § 10-13-36 and the total general fund balance of the taxing district exceeds forty percent as of December thirty-first in two consecutive years, the authority of the taxing district to have an excess tax levy is revoked. The taxing district is then subject to the tax levy limitations provided in § 10-13-35.
